core.name: Business-Aligned Predictive UI Framework
core.description: Integrates SWOT/SOSTAC analysis with AI-driven ROI forecasting to align interfaces with business goals and market positioning.

core.name: Ethical Job-to-Be-Done UI Mapping
core.description: Maps user 'jobs' to ethical risk assessments using AI, ensuring functional alignment with societal impact.

supporting.name: Competitive AI Benchmarking
supporting.description: Applies Porter's Five Forces with real-time social media sentiment analysis to identify UI optimization opportunities.

supporting.name: Job-to-Be-Done UI Mapping
supporting.description: Maps UI interactions to user 'jobs' usingJTBD framework for deeper functional alignment.

integration.name: Market-Driven Business Model Sync
integration.description: Automatically syncs UI components with business model updates while incorporating competitor benchmarking and market sentiment.

integration.name: Adaptive Content Heatmaps
integration.description: Combines user journey heatmaps with AIDA/PAS-driven content optimization for real-time conversion path refinement.

analytics.name: Scenario-Driven ROI Analytics
analytics.description: Forecasts UI ROI through business simulations that incorporate ethical risk, market trends, and historical data.

analytics.name: User Journey Heatmaps
analytics.description: Visualizes user paths overlaid with business outcome metrics (conversion, retention).

future.name: AI-Driven Business Scenario Simulations
future.description: Tests UI designs against hypothetical market scenarios using generative AI models.

future.name: Quantum Ethical Decision Engine
future.description: Uses quantum-inspired algorithms to resolve complex ethical tradeoffs in UI design.

future.name: Ethical-AI UI Copilot
future.description: AI assistant that guides UI design decisions by balancing job-to-be-done requirements with ethical risk assessments.

future.name: Competitive Scenario Generator
future.description: Generates hypothetical competitor strategies using Porter's Five Forces analysis to stress-test UI designs.
